name: com.holoi.holokit
description:
HoloKit Unity SDK enables Unity developers to develop StAR (Stereoscopic Augmented Reality) apps on HoloKit.

It provides two main features, which are stereoscopic rendering and hand tracking. The stereoscopic rendering feature allows developers to turn an AR project into a StAR one. The hand tracking feature provides a basic input method for the user to interact with the virtual contents in AR.

HoloKit SDK is compatible with ARFoundation.

samples.description: Contains sample project on how to setup a basic stereoscopic rendering scene
Contains sample project on how to setup a basic hand tracking scene
Contains sample project on demonstrating a common use case of hand tracking
